committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to remove certain restrictions on land acquisition for Antietam National Battlefield.

summary.text: Removes the restriction which prohibits the Secretary of the Interior from acquiring in fee by purchase or condemnation more than 600 acres of Antietam National Battlefield, Maryland. Amends the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to remove additional restrictions which authorized only certain scenic easement acquisitions.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain restrictions on land acquisition for Antietam National Battlefield.
